import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../Assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../Assets/cart_icon.png' const Navbar = () => { /*one user state variable*/ const [menu,setMenu] = useState("shop"); return (

shopper

  • {setMenu("shop")}}>Shop{menu==="shop"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("mens")}}>Men{menu==="mens"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("womens")}}>Women{menu==="womens"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("kids")}}>kids{menu==="kids"?

) } export default Navbar
